long_description: The Thule Quick Draw XT tie-downs quickly and securely fasten your boat's bow and stern to your car. Super-tough carabineers and ratchets do all the work, so you don't have to; a simple pull on the end of the rope and you get safe, secure tightness. The Thule Quick Draw XT is great for securing all types of long loads and hoisting items. Includes 2 assemblies to secure bow and stern of 1 boat.
short_description: The Thule Quick Draw XT tie-downs quickly and securely fasten your boat's bow and stern to your car.
